title: Wind Cave National Park: Birds - December Count
body: Birds - December Count       The Wind Cave December Bird Count centers on the Rankin Ridge Lookout and goes out 5 miles. This covers the entire National Park plus parts of Custer State Park and adjoining National Forest Service and private lands. In 2011 the decision was made to adjust the 15 mile diameter area particpants cover in order to include the Casey addition to the park. The next bird count will be in December 2015.  For more information contact the park by email or by phone 605-745-4600.            Species   2010   2011    2012    2013    2014   2015     Canada Goose   0   0   0   0   0         Mallard   6   0
